interface.description: The process uses PPU-scenarios in an XML format to produce an instance of the "Configuration"-metamodel
interface.label: Entire Project Parser

interface.description: The process uses PPU-scenarios with a single POU in an XML format to produce an instance of the "Configuration"-metamodel.
interface.label: Single POU Parser

interface.description: The callback produces an instance of the "Configuration" meta model
The callback produces an instance of the "Configuration" meta model for an exported single POU.
The parser uses the XML DOM library. Every Node of the XML document is processed in depth-first order.
